about_the_game:
Alone Again: The Countryside - Lore Book, aims to unravel the mysteries and events of Alone Again, exploring the deep and subjective details of this story.

Accessing the DLC:
After purchasing and downloading Alone Again: The Countryside - Lore Book, find the game in your computer's Steam Client, select “properties”, find the “local files” option and select “explore”. This will take you to the game files, where is the DLC.
After accessing the folder titled "The Lore Book DLC", you will be able to view all the DLC content! It is highly recommended to read the "SPOILER ALERT" file.

We strongly recommend that you DO NOT view this pack if you haven't finished the main game yet, as it contains numerous spoilers that will definitely detract from your final experience.

It is recommended to view the contents of this pack only after completing the game!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
